column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The injured Yok Huy appears to be languishing in pain.
Search for the jar of pigment.
Deliver the jar of pigment to the injured Yok Huy.
Urrrgh... A moment, if you would, visitor. You see, I was en route to deliver pigment from Worlar's Echo to Sentinel just ahead.
But fool that I was, I let my guard down, and─<Emphasis>oogh</Emphasis>─when monsters attacked, I had no choice but to flee for my life, abandoning my rations and even my precious cargo.
The beasts can have the food for all I care, but that pigment is essential for the repair of our cave murals.
Thus I ask─aaagh!─no, I <Emphasis>beseech</Emphasis> you: go and retrieve the jar of pigment I left behind near the Sunken Stars!
You'll find the pigment lying around somewhere near the Sunken Stars. Nnngh, they got me good...
The pain has receded in the time you were away, if only a little. Have you found the pigment?
Yes, this is it! Full glad am I to see it again, and with nary a crack in the jar. This will be of great use to the repair efforts.
Though these particular murals are shielded from the sun and other elements, they still fade with time, and so require regular upkeep.
I had intended to take part in the repairs myself, but...yeowch! I'm afraid I must first tend to my wounds at Sentinel.
